name: Zoya

reviews.comment: Zoya is an excellent teacher! I highly recommend her.
Zoya is very knowledgeable and patient. I enjoyed her classes.

lesson_info: The lessons focus on improving speaking and listening skills through interactive activities and discussions
conditions: Teaches only adult learners (18 years and above).
